text: The National Equestrian Center, known as the Olympic Equestrian Centre during the 2016 Summer Olympics, is an equestrian venue located at the Deodoro Olympic Park in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. The venue hosted the equestrian events for the 2016 Summer Olympics, and the equestrian events for the 2016 Summer Paralympics. ==Footnotes== ==References== *Rio2016.org.br bid package. Volume 2. p. 18\. Category:Sports venues in Rio de Janeiro (city) Category:Venues of the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic equestrian venues Category:Deodoro Olympic Park
title: National Equestrian Center
